data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 2, In Cadiz Cadiz drive forward through Jose Mari. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
In the minute 8, Sevilla advance rapidly upfield but David Medie Jimenez blows for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, David Medie Jimenez signals a Cadiz throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cadiz's Jorge Pombo breaks free at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 18, In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Cadiz, close to Sevilla's area.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
In the minute 21, Throw-in Sevilla.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Free kick Sevilla.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sevilla's Oliver Torres gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
Ivan Rakitic of Sevilla gets in a strike, but is off target.
David Medie Jimenez awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Cadiz.
Sevilla are caught offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
In the minute 36, Sevilla have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Sevilla's Youssef En-Nesyri gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Sevilla are coming forward and Suso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, David Medie Jimenez awards Cadiz a goal kick.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Sevilla.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Cadiz.
Throw-in for Sevilla at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 45, Sevilla push forward at Estadio Ramon de Carranza and Youssef En-Nesyri gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Cadiz defence.
At Estadio Ramon de Carranza the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Cadiz.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Cadiz throw-in in Sevilla's half.
In the minute 47, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Goal! Cadiz have got their heads in front thanks to a Salvi Sanchez strike.
That's a fine assist from Alvaro Negredo.
In the minute 52, Alvaro Negredo of Cadiz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Cadiz.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 58, Nemanja Gudelj (Sevilla) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Joan Jordan is on a sub for Sergi Gomez for Sevilla.
Luuk De Jong is replacing Youssef En-Nesyri for Sevilla at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 61, Julen Lopetegui (Sevilla) is making a third substitution, with Munir El Haddadi replacing Oliver Torres.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Sevilla at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Luuk De Jong (Sevilla) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 65, Great play from Jesus Navas to set up the goal.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Suso is booked for the away team.
In the minute 68, Throw-in high up the field for Cadiz in Cadiz.
David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
The away team replace Suso with Oscar.
Cadiz needs to be cautious. Sevilla have an attacking throw-in.
David Medie Jimenez awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Augusto Fernandez is replacing Jens Jonsson for the home team.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in Sevilla.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Cadiz make their second substitution with Filip Malbasic replacing Jose Mari.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Ramon de Carranza with Anthony Lozano replacing Alvaro Negredo.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 78, Juan Cala (Cadiz) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Lucas Ocampos with Bryan Salvatierra. This is the fifth substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
Sevilla to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Sevilla.
Attention is being given to Cadizâ€™s Salvi Sanchez and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 84, Fali (Cadiz) has replaced the possibly injured Salvi Sanchez.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Yann Bodiger is replacing Jorge Pombo for the home team.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sevilla goal kick.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Cadiz.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Cadiz.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Sevilla are whistled for offside.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Munir El Haddadi.
Joan Jordan with an assist there.
Augusto Fernandez for Cadiz has been booked by David Medie Jimenez and receives a first yellow card.
Cadiz's Marcos Mauro has been booked in Cadiz.
Fali (Cadiz) gets a yellow card.
Ivan Rakitic puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
Munir El Haddadi instrumental with a fine assist.
